Actors: Giulietta Masina, François Périer, Franca Marzi, Dorian Gray
Writer: Federico Fellini (story), Ennio Flaiano (story), Tullio Pinelli (story), Federico Fellini (screenplay), Ennio Flaiano (screenplay), Tullio Pinelli (screenplay), Pier Paolo Pasolini (collaboration)
Title: The Nights of Cabiria
Plot: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.
